definition: the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc)/the school authorities

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: If the inviter is studying in Canada, a letter of acceptance from the school.
sentences.chinese: 如果邀请人在加学习，校方出具的录取信。

sentences.english: She claims she was sent three emails from the college with little job advice.
sentences.chinese: 她称曾接到过校方的三封邮件，但基本没有就业指导。

sentences.english: The University should not lay off its employees on the ground of financial stringency .
sentences.chinese: 校方不应以财政紧绌为理由，解雇员工。

sentences.english: The son has since been expelled, officially because of poor grades.
sentences.chinese: 然而他的儿子已被开除，校方理由是成绩恶劣。

sentences.english: The name "high-level" afterwards from school admits TiKao nbsp132.
sentences.chinese: 这名“高水平运动员”事后向校方承认请人助考一事。

sentences.english: The school authorities consented to post- pone the examination.
sentences.chinese: 校方同意推迟考试日期。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Beihang officials canceled military training activities on October 30.
sentences.chinese: 10月30日这天，北航校方取消了军训活动。

sentences.english: What the university hopes to improve is its climate of inclusiveness.
The school told him that if he didn't stop playing about, he would fail in his exams.
sentences.chinese: 校方告诉他，要是他还瞎混的话，他考试会失败的。

sentences.english: They will also be able to apply to have their names and grades removed from the list before it is pinned up.
sentences.chinese: 学生还可在张榜前向校方申请不公布的名字和成绩。

sentences.english: Birgeneau, and other top administrators said in a statement.
sentences.chinese: 大学校长罗伯特和其他校方高级官员在声明里提到。

sentences.english: Do you guarantee residence for all IFP students?
sentences.chinese: 校方保证所有的IFP学生能入住的多大的寝室吗？

sentences.english: University officials said there were four suspects in the shooting and one was in custody.
sentences.chinese: 校方官员称枪击案有四名嫌疑人，其中一人已被羁押。

sentences.english: Tech has set up a counseling center in the Graduate Life Center.
sentences.chinese: 弗州理工校方已在研究生住宿区开设咨询中心。

sentences.english: But he applied again, and after viewing his collection of photographs, the school accepted him.
sentences.chinese: 但是他再次申请，校方看了他的摄影集后录取了他。

sentences.english: The school encouraged the students to practise using the computers.
sentences.chinese: 校方激励学生练习应用盘算机。
